definition: the act of fusing (or melting) together
details:
noun
- the act of fusing (or melting) together
- correction of an unstable part of the spine by joining two or more vertebrae
= synonyms: spinal fusion
- the combining of images from the two eyes to form a single visual percept
= synonyms: optical fusion
- an occurrence that involves the production of a union
= synonyms: unification, merger
- a nuclear reaction in which nuclei combine to form more massive nuclei with the simultaneous release of energy
= synonyms: nuclear fusion
- the merging of adjacent sounds or syllables or words
- the state of being combined into one body
= synonyms: coalition
